name: The Magic Pot
description:
This is the first game I have made using twine.

It uses Harlowe 3.

The plot follows a farmer who discovers a mysterious pot while plowing his newly purchased land. As the story progresses, he discovers what the pot is and what it does. 

I enjoy how the story's theme turned out it's simple, elegant, yet interactive and effective, which is exactly what I was hoping for. I adore the background music since it fits the mood of the story I was attempting to develop. 

The story has multiple endings which are based on the choices you have made earlier on in the game and it has a little something on the side that you can do
